Keywords: Excalibur , Generation X , Mystical , X-Men
Real Name: Jubilation Lee
Special Powers
RALLY (5): Opposing Attack Rolls . When Jubilee makes an attack, after resolutions you may remove one of her RALLY dice to give each hit character an action token.
HERE COME THE FIREWORKS!: Energy Explosion, Precision Strike.

Yeah she's good because it's important to deal with her. That's relatively easy to do, but if you ignore her she'll wreak havoc, and that has value.

No incap, but instead a weird power that puts tokens on figures. I've been away from the game but this seems weak for 60 points after seeing a few other figures.
